title: Augusta County: Mary A. Smiley to Thomas M. Smiley, July 13, 1861
summary: Discusses war sentiments, remaining unionism, skirmish at Martinsburg, union advances at Winchester and Charleston. Concerned about his bout with the measles in camp.
